name: nuclide-swift
description: Swift package manager integration for Nuclide.

sourceKittenDisabled.title: Disable SourceKitten
sourceKittenDisabled.description: Whether to disable integration with SourceKitten.

swiftToolchainPath.title: Swift Toolchain Path
swiftToolchainPath.description: Path to a Swift toolchain on your local system. If left blank, Nuclide will search for one at '/Library/Developer/Toolchains/swift-latest.xctoolchain' on OS X, or find one based on a 'swiftc' executable in your PATH on Linux.

sourceKittenPath.title: Path to SourceKitten Executable
sourceKittenPath.description: Path to a SourceKitten executable on your local system.
